trailingComments.value:
*
     * Tranlates the iVXio transition settings to animation events
     * to run at the onEnter and endEvent functions of each state.
     * 
     * @param {Array} endEvent - an array of events running at state end 
     * event.
     * @param {Array} onEnter - an array of events running at state start
     * @param {Object} state - state settings.

comments.value:
*
 * Utility class that helps add various global enhancements
 * to iVXio/iVXjs classes.

*
     * Creates a class of utility functions.

*
     * Tranlates the iVXio transition settings to animation events
     * to run at the onEnter and endEvent functions of each state.
